title: Finding My Way
description: Award winning author Mavis Applewater presents a classic romance about coming out. Dr. Stephanie Grant has carefully planned out her life. After accepting a position at Prower University she quickly learns that life doesn't follow a plan. After meeting Allison Kendell she begins to question if she has ever been happy. Suddenly her well planned life is spiraling out of control.
author: Mavis Applewater
